content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I'm looking for at least 1500 Euros per month. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a high price for an unfurnished apartment. I would be willing to pay 850 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that is way below my expectation. I'm looking for a higher price. Let's meet somewhere in the middle, say 1200 Euros per month. This is still a great deal for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, but 1200 Euros is still too much for me. I could do 950 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm trying to get the best price for my property. 950 Euros is too low, I'm afraid. Let's meet somewhere in the middle once again, say 1100 Euros per month. This is still a great deal for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a better price, but I'm still not sure I can afford it. I could do 1000 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I appreciate your effort to reach a deal. However, 1000 Euros is still not the best price for this property. Let's meet somewhere in the middle, say 1050 Euros per month. This is still a great deal for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1050 Euros] Euro!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
